title: Spring Asparagus Soup with Fennel and Meyer Lemon
directions: Add olive oil to soup pot. Add vegetables and “sweat” on low heat for about 20 minutes being careful not to brown. Add stock and water. Bring to boil, then turn to low and allow to cook for 30 minutes. Use high speed blender to blend until smooth. Return soup to pot. Add Lemon juice, salt, fennel pollen pepper and cream. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve hot or cold drizzled with olive oil.
ingredients: 1 lb Asparagus cut into 2 inch pieces
1 medium leek, white and light green parts, cleaned and cut into 2-inch pieces
1 bulb fennel, cored and cut into 2-inch hunks
4 cups Organic Imagine Vegetarian No Chicken Broth
1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1/2 cup Half and Half or 1/4 cup cashew cream
